Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.util.JsonUtils

extends Object
    Various utilities for processing JSON data.

    • Method Detail

      • processJSONString

        public static String processJSONString(String fieldName,
                                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonVal,
                                       String context,
                                       boolean required)
                                throws AnnotationServiceException
        Process the value of a field in the annotator bundle configuration that is expected to be of type JSON String.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the field we are processing, for error reporting purposes
        jsonVal - the input JSON value of expected type JSON String
        context - name of the input object where the input value comes from, for error messages
        required - whether the value is required to be non-null
        Returns:
        the String value of the input JSON value
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException - if the input JSON value is not of the expected type, or if the value is required but received a null value

      • processJSONBoolean

public static Boolean processJSONBoolean(String fieldName,

                                                     String context,
                                                     boolean required)
                                              throws AnnotationServiceException
        Deprecated. 
        Process the value of a field in the annotator bundle configuration that is expected to be of type JSON Boolean.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the field we are processing, for error reporting purposes
        jsonVal - the input JSON value of expected type JSON Boolean
        context - name of the input object where the input value comes from, for error messages
        required - whether the value is required to be non-null
        Returns:

        Throws:

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getVal(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode record,
                                                             String key)
                                                      throws AnnotationServiceException
        Fetch a value from a record, throwing an exception if the value is not found
        Parameters:
        record - record to search for the key
        key - key to search for
        Returns:
        value at the present key
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the value is not found
        AnnotationServiceException
